meanings.definition: A notice of a death, especially in a newspaper, typically including a brief biography of the deceased.
meanings.sent1: The obituaries in the paper informed us about the recent deaths in our community.
meanings.sent2: Every morning, I read the obituaries to learn about those who have passed away.
meanings.sent3: Reading the obituaries can sometimes remind us of the importance of cherishing each day.
meanings.sent4: The obituaries serve as a timeline of lives lived and stories told.
meanings.sent5: The vivid descriptions in the obituaries painted a picture of the individuals' lives.

meanings.definition: The section of a newspaper containing obituaries.
meanings.sent1: I turned to the obituaries to find information about the funeral services.
meanings.sent2: The obituaries were located at the back of the newspaper.
meanings.sent3: Some people skip the obituaries and head straight to the sports section.
meanings.sent4: The obituaries section was filled with heartfelt tributes and memories.
meanings.sent5: The obituaries section was a place to honor and remember those who have passed.
